# resetSystemTimeZone()

**Type Method**

Clears any time zone value cached for the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTimeZone/system] property.

## Declaration

```swift
class func resetSystemTimeZone()
```

## Discussion

If the app has cached the system time zone by accessing the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTimeZone/system] class property, this method clears that cached value. If you subsequently access the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTimeZone/system] class property, a new time zone object is created and cached.

## Working with System Time Zones

- **local**: An object that tracks the current system time zone.
- **system**: The time zone currently used by the system.
- **default**: The default time zone for the current app.
